#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000000
#define MAXN 500005
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
int64 dp[51][51][2];
int a[51],n,fin;
int64 go(int idx,int pre,int flag){
	if(idx==n){
		if(!flag)
		return 1;
		return 0;
	}
	if(pre!=-1){
	if(dp[idx][pre][flag]!=-1)
	return dp[idx][pre][flag];}
	// no oper
	int64 ret=0;
	
	if(a[idx]>pre)
	ret+=go(idx+1,a[idx],flag);
	
	//oper a
	
	for(int i=a[idx]+1;i<fin;i++){
	if(i>pre)
	ret+=go(idx+1,i,1);}
	
	
	//oper b
	for(int i=a[idx]-1;i>pre;i--)
	ret+=go(idx+1,i,0);
	
	dp[idx][pre][flag]=ret;
	return ret;
}
 
int main(){
	int t,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		fin=a[n-1];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(int j=0;j<=50;j++){
				dp[i][j][0]=-1;
				dp[i][j][1]=-1;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",go(0,-1,0)-1);
	}
	return 0;
}
